org.icij.datashare.text.nlp

Class AbstractNlpPipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.icij.datashare.text.nlp.AbstractNlpPipeline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NlpPipeline
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreNlpPipeline, GateNlpPipeline, IxaNlpPipeline, MitieNlpPipeline, OpenNlpPipeline

    public abstract class AbstractNlpPipeline
extends Object
implements NlpPipeline
    Common structure and behavior of NlpPipeline implementations Pipelines (models and annotators) are loaded lazily, at NlpPipeline.run(String) invocation) Created by julien on 3/29/16.

      • dfs

        private void dfs(NlpStage stage,
                 Set<NlpStage> visited,
                 List<NlpStage> sorted,
                 Map<NlpStage,List<NlpStage>> stagesMatrix)
        Depth-First Search traversal of stage dependencies
        Parameters:
        stage - the current stage being traversed
        visited - keeps the set of already seen stages during traversal
        sorted - represents the stages, in post-fix DFS traversal order
        stagesMatrix - holds stages dependencies
